|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "48RNRA0K.0GA", "2010/04/07", "Welkin-HP", and "AL1-002484-00"<...> is silkscreened on the top of the board in the images provided by [[User:Mns|Mns]] below. :The 802.11bgn radio (AR9283) is using two [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=958 '''Skyworks''' ('''SiGe''') SE2598L / 2598L (19dbm) 2.4GHz power amplifier ICs]. ==Links of Interest== ===Vendor links=== [http://www.amazon.co.jp/NEC-Aterm-WR8170N-HP%E3%83%A2%E3%83%87%E3%83%AB-PA-WR8170N-HP/dp/B003MZQR16/ On '''Amazon.co.jp'''] :ASIN: B003MZQR16, Date added: 2010-05-19, Shipping weight: 566g ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
J2
(VCC) (GND) (N/A) (TX) (RX)
pin5  pin4  pin3  pin2  pin1
